title: Wits & Wagers
description: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 2-4, Local Multiplayer 2-4, HD (High Definition). Upgrade now to the full version of Wits & Wagers, and unlock 25 full hours of unique questions! With local and online play, plus the ability to link one group of local users to another group via “couch-to-couch” multiplayer, Wits & Wagers is a party waiting to happen. Get 700 questions, great character costumes and dance moves, catchy music, achievements, leaderboards, support for the Xbox LIVE Vision camera, and more. This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive or the 512MB Memory Unit for storage. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

contentRating.label: E (Everyone)
disclaimers: Online Interactions Not Rated by the ESRB

childDownloads.title: Trial Game - Wits & Wagers
childDownloads.description: Single Player, Xbox LIVE Multiplayer 2-4, Local Multiplayer 2-4, HD (High Definition). Play a full round of questions in this free trial version of Wits & Wagers, based on the award-winning board game! Use your knowledge of trivia, human nature, and the odds to guess which answer is closest to the truth. Challenging questions, upbeat music, and dancing characters keep the game lively and fun for family and friends!  This game requires the Xbox 360 hard drive or the 512MB Memory Unit for storage.

childDownloads.title: Wits & Wagers - Picture Pack 1
childDownloads.description: Wits & Wagers Picture Pack 1 contains 7 fun faces you can use from female characters in Wits & Wagers. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Wits & Wagers - Picture Pack 3
childDownloads.description: Wits & Wagers Picture Pack 3 contains 7 fun faces you can use from the crazy and animal characters in Wits & Wagers. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.

childDownloads.title: Wits & Wagers Question Pack 2
childDownloads.description: Energize your Wits & Wagers experience with 280 new questions and fun facts.  Purchase this pack for use in all local and selected online games.  Online, packs are automatically used if owned by all participants in a game. There are no refunds for this item. For more information, see www.xbox.com/live/accounts.
